import ArrowBackIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ArrowBack'; import React from 'react'; import useCheckInAction from '../../hooks/useCheckInAction' import Otherattendace from '../Dialogs/Otherattendace' import BtnAttendance from '../Button/BtnAttendance' const Numpad = () => { const {addNumpadPassword} = useCheckInAction() const { clearPassword } = useCheckInAction() const onClickNumpad = (num: string) => { addNumpadPassword(num) } return (
) } export default Numpad
